entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 1997/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó

entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: media consumption, evaluation of the situation of Hungary; evaluation of the economic situation of Hungary; poverty, wealth, working; assumption of responsibiliyt by the government in the social policy; evaluation of the activities of the political parties; evaluation of their own financial situation; possibilities of enterprises; changes in prices, inflation, unemployment and the policy of the government regarding this; party preferences, attitudes and opinions about them; religion
